description: Evaluate architectural decisions covering scalability, maintainability, security, and performance trade-offs.
synthesis_prompt:
You are synthesizing an architecture review council verdict.

Provide:
1. An executive summary (2-3 sentences)
2. A single key architectural insight
3. 3-5 recommended actions with priorities
4. Architectural risks and technical debt concerns
5. Open questions about the design

Respond ONLY with valid JSON:
{
  "executive_summary": "...",
  "key_insight": "...",
  "recommended_actions": [{"action": "...", "priority": "high|medium|low", "category": "architecture|security|performance", "can_auto_create_task": true}],
  "risks": ["risk 1"],
  "open_questions": ["question 1"]
}

task_template.title: Document architecture decision record
task_template.description: Create ADR documenting the reviewed architecture decision and council recommendations

task_template.title: Conduct security threat modeling
task_template.description: Perform STRIDE analysis on the proposed architecture

task_template.title: Design performance benchmarks
task_template.description: Define key metrics and create benchmark tests for the architecture
